The Automation Lead Engineer is responsible for overseeing the efficient operation and maintenance of the BMS and BAS infrastructure within the data center facility, ensuring optimal performance and reliability of critical systems. They will lead a team of technicians, manage system upgrades and expansions, monitor environmental conditions, and develop strategies for energy efficiency and cost savings.Client DetailsWe are currently partnering with one of the leading multinational data center companies who is looking for a competent Automation Lead Engineer to help them with their expansion in Indonesia.DescriptionGood record of BMS project management, BMS designing, IOT understanding. Provide electrical design for a wide range of projects, and work with other engineers, project managers, and construction professionals as needed.Design and install electrical and BMS control system to meet refrigeration system requirements in projects. With an eye of details for continuous improvement.Having knowledge of IT infrastructure.Familiar with local design code for Electrical and Control system design.Working knowledge of building energy management systems. Has good understanding of data center efficiency & Controls; but not limited to BMS Control, pneumatic controls, mechanical Control systems, lighting controls, access control and backup emergency systems for efficient functioning of Data centers.Working knowledge on field instrumentation such as temperature, pressure, and flow devices typically connected to an automation system.Ability to diagnose, repair, and return all automation systems to efficient operation condition.Capable of working out in the field and perform troubleshooting of BMS controller & IO devices. Capability to proactively identifying SPOF's and suggest improvements to the existing BMS system to reduce BMS-related system failures, and to improve the efficiency of the building.Maintain advanced technical skills with solid workings of Automation Platforms.Review and understand the project documents, BMS submission and Validation of the technical specification.Ensure best installation practice to the field team, to ensure the control system installation standards of quality are always maintained and improved. Also, Develop and oversee all aspects of installation including electrical installation, control system, selection of components, equipment, installation method, testing, and implementation of the Refrigeration / HVAC systems.Ensure project expectations are always effectively communicated to the customers and project stakeholders in a clear and concise fashion.Willing to learn, accept opportunity for creative design with strong theoretical knowledge for commercial and industrial Refrigeration / HVAC projects.Should have quick decision-making capability to overcome a site incident with minimal downtime.Should have good technical and Interpersonal skills, good judgement, clear communication skills, self-driven and ability to help others.Knowledge on digital Twin will be an added advantage.Knowledge about calculating the building load and designing BMS structure to reduce the PUE of the Data center.ProfileBachelor Degree in Engineering in Automation, Instrumentation, Electrical Engineering, or related fields preferred.A minimum of 8 years as an Automation Engineer, Commissioning Engineer, or BMS design Engineer or equivalent in a Data center related work environment, or a combination of education, service, and/or practical work experience.3- 7 years of relevant facilities maintenance, Project management, BMS commissioning and repair experience in a commercial, Data center or industrial setting.Knowledge on networking with understanding of redundant BMS architecture.Experience with data center equipment/environments, including switch gears, generators, chillers, cooling towers, air handling units, controls, security monitoring systems, fire safety systems, and an understanding of start-up /commissioning processes preferred.Focus with the ability to handle multiple assignments in a fast-paced environment. With eye for details; and has done troubleshooting of BMS / IBMS systems in a live system.Hands-on experience in Data center operation, Design and projects.Good interpersonal skills including good verbal and written communication in English.Job OfferGreat career prospects as the growth opportunity in the company is tremendous.The chance to really impact the decisions of a very successful business and input into process, procedures & systems.To apply online please click the 'Apply' button below. For a confidential discussion about this role please contact Veny Adilia on +62 21 2958 8846.

Calling for all research analysts in Indonesia! Entry Level Research Analysts (Market Research) About usCorrosaLab is a growing digital consulting service agency in the field of marketing and sustainability. We have global footprints across Europe, US, and Asia. We help our clients with two main services: market research, digital business, and sustainability consulting. Our mission is to provide insights to business owners and stakeholders to make informed decisions and operate sustainably. Location: Remote (Indonesia) We are looking for a talented research analyst to join our team. The ideal candidate should have experience in conducting deep, extensive market research on specific topics. The candidate must be able to communicate effectively and fluently in business English, and fluency in Bahasa Indonesia is an added advantage. Responsibilities:Conduct deep secondary/desktop research using various sources to gather data on specific topics.Collect and organize data using Excel spreadsheets.Analyze data and present insights and recommendations in PowerPoint or Word documents.Stay up-to-date with industry trends and news (e.g., tech, sustainability, retail, finance)Participate in strategy discussions to develop research objectives and methodology.Meet project deadlines. Requirements:Proven experience in market research, with a portfolio of past research work.Excellent research skills, including the ability to conduct deep secondary research and gather data using various sources.Strong analytical skills with experience in data analysis.Ability to present complex data and insights in a clear and concise manner.Excellent communication skills in business English, both written and verbal.Proficiency in Excel, PowerPoint, and Word.Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.Comfortable working remotely and collaboratively within a team.Communicate and collaborate with the latest digital tools (e.g., Slack, Google Suite, Notion, etc.) Types of clients:We provide our services to various organizations such as Small and Medium Enterprises (SMEs), startups, business owners, and large companies (multi-nationals) in the commercial sector industry. Our clients consist of local and global companies worldwide EU, US, MENA, and APAC with multiple timezones. If you're a talented research analyst with a track record of conducting deep, extensive market research on specific topics, we'd love to hear from you. Please submit your resume, portfolio of past research work, and a cover letter explaining why you would be a good fit for this role. Senior Manager, Engineering Services – Data Centre LeadAccount Management – Work DynamicsROLE AND RESPONSIBILITIESJob Description:As a Data Center Leader in Indonesia, you will play a critical role in overseeing the site team operations and managing all aspects of data center operations. You will need to have a deep understanding of the data center market in Indonesia, stay up to date with the latest trends and technologies, and be able to effectively liaise with local vendors specific to data center operations.Job Summary:Strategy and Account Management· Ensure that account plans are implemented and aligned with client objectives.· Be accountable for the profit, loss and growth of the assigned portfolio of accounts.· Work with the Account Management Enablement organization to implement the agreed account management practices.· Be accountable for operational risk management and mitigation on the DC accounts in the portfolio.· Work in tandem with DC Operations Vertical to ensure best engineering practices are implemented on the accounts and risk management support extended to the accounts· Client Relationship Management· Proactively drive teams to prepare for all client renewals – striving for off market renewals all the time.· Unlock opportunities for account growth and work with the account team and/or Sales organization to convert these opportunities.· Work with the Sales team on new bids and presentations to achieve the Sales targets. Provide strategic guidance as well as support for bids, presentations and other similar support activities.· Leverage external networks to further sales and business development efforts. Talent Management· Create a high-performing, integrated team who are committed to delivering exceptional client results.· Ensure all accounts have a clear skill management plan particularly for personnel deployed directly in managing and operating critical spaces· Critically analyze account managers’ performance (account based staff and “hosted” account staff) and build feedback into actionable development plans.Account Operations:· Ensure Operational risk for all DC accounts in portfolio is effectively managed and mitigation measure reported out· Work with the HR Business Partners on talent management programs· Work with the Delivery Organization to drive operational excellence, efficiency initiatives, risk management and compliance· Work towards best in class delivery keeping in view rapidly changing environment around work, workplace and technology.· Maintain visibility over the operational compliances and certifications for all client sites; ensuring that appropriate actions are taken by account teams.· Initiate strategies to achieve measurable improvements in energy consumption, in conjunction with the Engineering Manager.· Develop and implement innovative programs and processes that reduce short- and long-term operating costs, increase productivity and increase revenue.· Work together with site team, support a variety of critical business functions including financial, procurement, vendor management, contract management, transportation programs and general office services. Find innovative ways to streamline and enhance service delivery, while keeping an eye on the bottom line.Market Knowledge:· Stay informed about the latest developments, trends, and regulations in the Indonesian data center market.· Conduct regular market research to identify potential opportunities, emerging technologies, and best practices.· Analyse competitor strategies and market dynamics to inform decision-making and maintain a competitive edge.Vendor Management:· Develop and maintain relationships with local vendors specific to data center operations, such as power suppliers, HVAC contractors, security providers, and maintenance service companies.· Negotiate service agreements, pricing, and contracts with vendors to ensure optimal service levels are maintained within budget.· Manage vendor performance, conduct regular audits, and resolve any escalations or disputes.Compliance and Risk Management:· Ensure compliance with all applicable regulations, standards, and certifications related to data center operations.· Implement and maintain robust operation processes, security protocols, including access control, surveillance systems Emergency Operation procedures, and disaster recovery procedures.· Conduct regular risk assessments, develop mitigation plans, and ensure business continuity in the event of emergencies or disruptions.Stakeholder Communication:· Collaborate with internal stakeholders, such as IT teams, engineering teams, and business unit leaders, to align data center operations with organizational goals and strategies.· Communicate effectively with senior management by providing regular updates on data center performance, key metrics, and any significant issues or developments.Requirement:· Bachelor's degree in computer science, About MAKAMotorsMAKA is dedicated to building the best electric motorcycles for Indonesian riders, driven by top-notch local engineering and craftsmanship. We believe that motorcycles are more than just a mode of transportation in Indonesia—they’re a way of life. That’s why we’re committed to accelerating the country’s electrification efforts with motorcycles that are specifically designed for the unique needs of Indonesian riders.Our goal is simple: to create the best motorcycles possible—made by Indonesians, for Indonesians.About the challengeAre you passionate about the world of data engineering and adept at managing data infrastructure? Do you possess a proven track record of translating data strategies into robust engineering solutions? If you're known for your technical expertise and your ability to design and implement data pipelines, you could be the ideal candidate for us!As a Data Engineer Specialist at MAKA Motors, you will be held accountable for ensuring and guarantee the data that used is always in high reliable, recorded, safe and secure. Your role will involve close collaboration with cross-functional teams, ensuring data engineering aligns with our data-driven organizational goals.Is this you?A bachelor's degree in Informatics, Computer Science, Information Systems, Software Engineering, or a related field.A minimum of 5 years of practical experience in Data Engineering, demonstrating a deep understanding of data management and engineering principles.Proficiency in a range of programming languages, including C, C#, Python, Java, and SQL, to effectively work with and manipulate data.Familiarity with server systems, cloud servers, and mobile platforms (Android/iOS) to support data engineering activities and adapt to different data environments.Strong work ethic and a passion for delivering high-quality results. Demonstrated respect from peers and colleagues, and a willingness to collaborate across departments or divisions to achieve the company's goals, reflecting a team-oriented mindset. What a day at work for you will look likeDevelop and implement a comprehensive data engineering strategy that includes creating tools, structures, and methods for manufacturing data. Ensure the strategy aligns with the company's data standards and best practices.Implement rigorous data quality assurance processes, including strict adherence to Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs), technology and tools quality inspections, and staying updated with quality data trends to ensure that data meets Maka's standards.Take charge of data security by establishing robust measures to safeguard sensitive information. Ensure data compliance with relevant regulations and internal policies.Design and maintain data systems that enable efficient traceability of data for after-sales support and quality response time. Ensure data retrieval, transfer, backup, and storage are well-organized and accessible.Oversee the maintenance of server systems to support data engineering activities, ensuring that they run smoothly and efficiently.

Job Title: Data Annotators Flexible Work Unlimited Income Opportunities Join Us Now
Job Description: Data Annotators play a pivotal role in shaping the excellence of Machine Learning (ML) and AI systems. By meticulously identifying entities, classifying data, and validating model outputs in extensive textual datasets, data annotators ensure the precision and reliability of the data fueling ML algorithms. These experts are essential navigators in the realm of AI, contributing to the overall accuracy and efficiency of systems that rely on recurrent patterns and specific entities.We are seeking a meticulous and organized Data Annotator for a 3-month contract each time which is potentially extendable to 1 year. In this role, you will collaborate with our data science team and play a vital part in handling large textual data sets. Your primary responsibilities will include identifying and labeling data in various entities:Image AnnotationVideo AnnotationVoice AnnotationText Annotation3D Point Cloud AnnotationAutomatic AnnotationData ValidationResponsibilities:Execute the identification and labeling of data across various entities.Categorize documents into diverse classifications.Validate the outcomes produced by Machine Learning models.Discern recurring patterns within datasets.Ensure precision and reliability in the process of data annotation.Requirements:Minimum of a high school degree or above.Personals who have a passion and experience of playing PC games are preferred.Highly adept at navigating a PC/laptop with proficient skills in utilizing both keyboard and mouse.Basic proficiency in English.Exhibit a high level of reliability and meticulous attention to detail.Capable of efficiently handling repetitive tasks with consistent quality.Showcase solid organizational skills.Ability to work independently and effectively. Explore a dynamic opportunity and elevate your career by joining us as a Data Annotator. Dive into the world of part-time flexibility, where your computer and internet connection become the tools for a dynamic work experience. In this role, your fee is tied to your output – with no income limitation as long as quality is maintained. Your attention to detail will shine as your meticulous examination and categorization of large datasets will be the driving force behind shaping the future of machine learning. Your commitment to accurate labeling and organization will play a key role and directly impact the effectiveness of training and refining machine learning models, making your role indispensable in the realm of data science.

informasi, dan regulator keuangan, untuk mengumpulkan informasi yang relevan.Memantau perubahan regulasi dan praktik terkait penipuan di sektor keuangan, dan memastikan bahwa sistem dan prosedur klien analisis risiko yang baik dan pemahaman tentang kebijakan keamanan informasi di sektor keuangan. Keterampilan Tambahan yang Diinginkan:Sertifikasi keamanan keuangan seperti Certified Fraud Examiner Sekilas Tentang PerusahaanPT Sarana Yukti Bandhana (SYB) adalah penyedia dan operator sistem pembayaran. Selama lebih dari 20 tahun, SYB telah merintis ekosistem pembayaran digital yang menjamin transaksi diproses secara efisien dan aman.SYB menawarkan beragam saluran pembayaran digital, melayani berbagai sektor, mulai dari utilitas public, perbankan, keuangan, asuransi, pendidikan, telekomunikasi, hiburan, game online, e-commerce, sampai e-wallet dan e-money.Kami berusaha keras untuk menjadi pelopor di ranah digital dan memberikan pelanggan kami solusi keuangan yang aman dan inovatif, dirancang untuk memajukan jasa keuangan di seluruh Asia. Ringkasan Peran Sebagai Market Research Analyst, Anda akan melapor ke Business Process Manager dan peran Anda akan mencakup hal-hal berikut:Draft Laporan Penelitian: Menyusun laporan penelitian yang mensintesis temuan yang berasal dari data kualitatif dan kuantitatif. Kelola peringatan penelitian ad-hoc dan dukung pembaruan bulanan lintas tim mengenai tren komersial yang relevan.Mempresentasikan Temuan Penelitian kepada Pemangku Kepentingan Senior: Mempersiapkan dan menyajikan presentasi penelitian pada pertemuan rutin bagi pemangku kepentingan senior untuk memberikan wawasan tentang pasar, memahami implikasi kebijakan, memandu penelitian strategis dan mendukung proses pengambilan keputusan strategis organisasi.Analisis Pasar yang Komprehensif: Menganalisis tren pasar, peluang dan risiko dalam industri pembayaran.Analisis Data Keuangan: Mengevaluasi data keuangan, termasuk pendapatan, biaya, dan profitabilitas, untuk mendukung temuan penelitian kualitatif.Menerjemahkan Laporan : Menerjemahkan laporan berita dari Bahasa Indonesia ke Bahasa Inggris dan memberikan rangkuman secara berkala.Berkolaborasi dengan Pemangku Kepentingan Internal: Berkolaborasi secara efektif dengan berbagai tim internal untuk mengumpulkan informasi lapangan guna mendukung temuan penelitian.Kualifikasi & Keahlian yang dibutuhkanPendidikan: Minimal S1 , Semua JurusanPengalaman Kerja: Lulusan Baru, atau pengalaman kerja minimal 2 tahun.Domisili: Berdomisili di DKI Jakarta.Ketersediaan: Dapat mulai bekerja sesegera mungkin dan bersedia bekerja di lokasi kantor pusat perusahaan di Jakarta.Bahasa Indonesia & Inggris: Mampu menulis dan berbicara dalam bahasa Indonesia dan bahasa Inggris.Keahlian Riset & Penelitian: Mampu menghasilkan riset berkelas institusional dan menunjukkan sikap proaktif dalam menjaga diri tetap update dengan tren-tren yang muncul.Kemampuan Analitis: Memperlihatkan kemampuan analitis yang kuat dengan kemampuan untuk mensintesis wawasan yang kohesif dari berbagai sumber data. Mampu berpikir secara kritis dan merumuskan strategi untuk mendorong pertumbuhan bisnis.Analisis Keuangan: Kemampuan untuk melakukan evaluasi metrik keuangan dan mahir dalam analisis keuangan.Keterampilan Menulis : Memiliki keterampilan tertulis yang kuat untuk menyampaikan temuan kompleks dengan cara yang jelas dan menonjol. Memiliki keterampilan mengedit yang efektif (misalnya tata bahasa dan tipografi) untuk meningkatkan kualitas publikasi penelitian. Etos Kerja: Memiliki etos kerja yang kuat, mandiri dan memiliki integritas tinggi. Mampu beradaptasi dengan lingkungan kerja yang cepat, mampu menangani deadline, dan permintaan pekerjaan ad-hoc dengan cepat.Berorientasi pada Detail: Mampu menyusun dokumentasi proyek yang komprehensif dengan teliti dan secara konsisten.Microsoft Office: Mahir dalam Microsoft Office Word, Excel, dan PowerPoint.BenefitKami melakukan investasi dalam personnel kami, serta perkembangan karir & kesejahteraan. Berikut adalah benefit yang kami berikan:Tunjangan layanan kesehatanTunjangan TelekomunikasiKebijakan cuti keluargaPelatihan karyawan yang komprehensifTim yang kolaboratif dan berketerampilan tinggiLingkungan kerja yang kondusif ____________________________________________________________________________________________________ Company OverviewPT Sarana Yukti Bandhana (SYB) is a payment systems provider and operator. For more than 20 years, SYB has pioneered a digital payment ecosystem that ensures transactions are processed in a streamlined and secure manner.SYB offers a diverse array of digital payment channels, serving a myriad of sectors, ranging from public utilities, banking, finance, insurance, education, telecommunication, entertainment, online gaming, e-commerce, to e-wallet and e-money.We strive to be on the vanguard of the digital landscape and provide our customers with sound and innovative financial solutions, tailored to advance financial services across Asia. Roles OverviewAs a Market Research Analyst you will report to the Business Process Manager and your role will encompass the following: Draft Research Reports: Compose research reports that synthesize findings derived from both qualitative and quantitative data. Manage ad-hoc research alerts and support monthly cross-team updates on relevant commercial trends.Present Research Findings to Senior Stakeholders: Prepare and present research presentations at regular meetings for senior stakeholders to provide insight into the market, understand policy implications, guide strategic research and support the organization's strategic decision-making process.Comprehensive Market Analysis: Analyze market trends, opportunities and risks within the payments industry.Financial Data Analysis: Evaluate financial data, including revenue, costs, and profitability, to support qualitative research findings.Translate Reports: Translate news reports from Indonesian to English and provide summaries on a regular basis. Collaborate with Internal Stakeholders: Collaborate effectively with various internal teams to garner field information to support research findings. Qulification & Skills RequiredEducation: Bachelor degree holder in any discipline. Work Experience: Fresh Graduate, or has minimal work experience of 2 years.Domicile: Domiciled in Jakarta. Availability: Able to commence work as soon as possible and willing to work on-site in the Jakarta headquarters.Language Skills: Strong written and spoken Indonesian and English skills. Research Skills: Able to produce institutional grade research and showcases a proactive attitude towards staying abreast with emerging trends. Analytical Skills: Demonstrates strong analytical skills with the ability to synthesize cohesive insights from a variety of data sources. Able to think critically and formulate strategies to drive business growth.Financial Analysis: Ability to evaluate financial metrics and is proficient financial analysis. Written Skills: Possesses strong written skills to convey complex findings in a clear and salient manner. Possesses effective editing skills (e.g. grammar and typography) to improve the quality of research publications. Work Ethic: Demonstrates a strong work ethic, self-driven and possess a high degree of integrity. Able to adapt to a fast-paced work environment, manage multiple deadlines and respond to ad-hoc work requests quickly. Detail Oriented: Is conscientious in nature and pays high attention to detail. Microsoft Office Tools: Proficient in Microsoft Office tools, such as Word, Excel and PowerPoint.BenefitsWe invest in our people, their career development and their well-being. procedures.• To audit document control within the warehouse data input area.• Performs physical cyclic stocktaking at all warehouses and lay down locations and investigates variances.• Prepare inventory adjustment sheets and forward though to immediate supervisor for review.• Prepares reports advising management of count discrepancies found by warehouse locations.• Performs audits and inspections in the data input area to ensure documentation is processed in an accurate and timely manner in accordance with policies and procedures.• Coordinates with Administration Coordinators to performance.• Recommends stock preservation to warehouse supervisors for items that require special storage requirements.• Coordinates with user departments to ensure that technical inspections are Job Title: Principal Community Relation Analyst Wfo Ntb Id
Job Description: Position : Principal Community Relation AnalystLocation : Dompu, NTBRole Summary & Responsibility : As a Principal Community Relations Analyst, he/she will play a pivotal role in ensuring that Company operations align with community interests, particularly in regions affected by mining activities. He/she will be responsible for conducting social impact assessments to identify and mitigate potential negative effects on local communities. His/her expertise in management, conflict resolution, and understanding of pertinent laws and regulations will be crucial in fostering positive relationships and sustainable practices.Social Impact Assessment: Conduct thorough assessments to evaluate the potential social implications of mining operations on local communities. Identify key stakeholders and engage in meaningful dialogue to understand their concerns and needs.Mitigation Strategies: Develop comprehensive strategies to mitigate adverse effects on communities, including but not limited to environmental degradation, displacement, and socio-economic disruptions. Collaborate with relevant departments to implement these strategies effectively.Community Engagement: Establish and maintain strong relationships with community leaders, organizations, and residents. Facilitate regular communication channels to address grievances, gather feedback, and foster mutual understanding.Conflict Resolution: Act as a mediator in resolving conflicts between the company and community stakeholders. Employ diplomatic skills and negotiation techniques to find mutually beneficial solutions and prevent escalation of tensions.Compliance and Regulatory Adherence: Stay updated on local and national laws, regulations, and policies relevant to mining activities and community relations. Job Description: About the RoleThe Economic Research Analyst will work under the supervision of our experienced and highly supportive Portfolio/Investment Analyst to help drive the commercial and economic data strategy. The role will conduct economic research, gathering and analysing data, and producing reports across many regions in the world. This role has a strong focus on economic research and data analysis. To be successful in this role you will have proven experience in economic research, a positive teamwork attitude and a strong interest in economic data analytics. We will provide the tools and support to set you up for success.Main ResponsibilitiesResearch and review economic indicators and data relevant to the company’s investment opportunities.Review economic indicators, sector data, metrics, and other key drivers of economic performance.Source and consolidate information from various sources and subject matter experts to deliver value-added economic insights.Undertaking qualitative and quantitative analysis, utilising a range of data sourcesDevelop capability in new methods of analysing and presenting dataReport writing and preparation of presentations.Providing inputs to proposals for potential projects.Essential RequirementsProfessional written and verbal communication skills in English.Must have at least a bachelor’s degree in economicsAt least 2 years of experience in doing economic research, data analysis and producing reports.Strong analytical skills with a good understanding of economic data across many sectors and regions in the world.Experience in producing research and summary reports. Advanced numerical, reconciliation and problem-solving skills.Advance level of competency with Excel.High level of attention to detail and good organisational skills.Desirable Experience and Skills Previous experience in the financial services industry highly regarded.Knowledge of products and services within the financial services Industry highly regarded.Experience of working in a fast-paced and medium enterprise environment highly regarded. It is a great opportunity to be part of a fast-growing organisation with opportunities for career development and progression. In return, you will be rewarded for your drive to make positive impact to the Hejaz team.To submit your application, please click on “Apply” to send your CV and cover letter. Only shortlisted applicants will be contacted.We reserve the right to close this vacancy early if we have received sufficient applications and suitable applicants have been selected for the role. Therefore, if you are interested, please submit your application as early as possible. Learn more about Hejaz and our business by visiting our website: https://www.hejazfs.com.au/

Job Title: Senior Equity Research Analyst English Or Chinese
Job Description: Responsibilities:1. As an Equity Research Analyst, you will play a crucial role in conducting in-depth research on companies, enabling a comprehensive understanding of the Indonesian market. Under the tutelage of accomplished private equity investors, you will refine your writing and logical thinking skills , preparing you for potential advancement to the role of a fund manager.2. Join the industry research group of the Company's Securities Research Institute, conduct in-depth research on all listed companies in a certain 1-2 industries, analyze and judge the industry competition pattern, and predict the future long-term development of the industry.3. Conduct on-site or telephone online surveys of listed companies, interview industry experts, senior industry funds and professional investors to build understanding of the industry and listed companies.Day to day task includes：-Craft meticulous research reports tailored for both retail and institutional investors within predetermined deadlines.-Conduct thorough company analysis through a combination of online sources and on-site surveys to extract unique insights.Qualifications:1. A graduate from a reputable university (Minimum GPA 3.2) with a major in finance, accounting, economics, or related field2. Over three years of hands-on experience and a solid theoretical foundation in the value research and assessment of listed companies, with a background of three or more years as a fund manager or industry and company researcher.3. Expertise in enterprise valuation methodologies, including a mastery of models such as DCF and DDM. Proficient in fundamental analysis of companies with a robust foundation in financial and economic analysis. Those who can use the Bloomberg system are preferred.4. Profound knowledge of industry analysis methodologies, demonstrating the ability to rapidly assess industries, make informed judgments on growth and development, and articulate critical points in industry assessments.5. Fluent in Chinese or English for effective communication, possessing polished presentation skills, and adept in utilizing tools such as Bloomberg and Microsoft Office.Demonstrate a commitment to excellence, uphold radical truthfulness, possess an open-minded approach, and exhibit strategic intelligence.6. Kemitraan

 bisnis perusahaan.
